name: Bill
description:
Important note : 

  1. Many people who tried to download the game had trouble installing it because I tried to create an Executable file. I link below a normal Unity version of the game, it's preferable if it doesn't work for you, otherwise, it should be fine :)
  2. The game can be slow and laggy, I really apologize for that, and at some point, a bug will appear that makes it impossible to pick up items anymore, but you should be able to do a lot of things and have fun before you get to that point. 
  3. The last thing I wanted to tell you is that I clearly aim too high for a game of one week, that's why it's not perfect. 
    But I worked really really hard and put my heart into it. I had short nights, from breakfast to sleeping time, I was working on it, to be able to make all the art and programming that I wanted to.  So it would mean so so much to me if you could bypass the difficult installation and bugs to see how much I tried to give in this game. I promise you, it will be worth it :)

Tip : Don't go to the right after the first construction, there's a collider I forgot to add, so you will fall of the world, woops, woopsy XD 

If you can't install it, try this one, it's the Unity file, it works better.
https://marijenburg.itch.io/bill-webgl-version

What's BILL about ?

"Bill procrastinates and accumulates stuff, it's time that he declutters and advances in his projects"

  • You will collect your mess laying around in the house
  •  Recycle it at the crafting table
  • Build cool projects with the material that you got from recycling

    Crafting, SimsLike, inspired by Stardew Valley

Thank you so much for trying it
